Backs up Git repositories on a schedule

Related repos

  • mirrors GitHub repos to Gitea with code, issues, PRs, releases, and wikis
  • backup and mirror git repositories across platforms
  • backs up all your git repos to your machine
  • Automatically absorbs changes into git commits
  • Tracks GitHub traffic history beyond the 14 day limit
  • Terminal-based git interface for managing repositories with keyboard shortcuts and interactive views
  • git repo history rewriting tool, removes files, changes authors, edits commits
  • cli tool turns github repos into single text files
  • multiplatform git client with visual diffs, history, and repo management
